name: Alert
description: Your senses are always on the lookout for danger, granting you faster reactions to threats.

name: Great Weapon Master
description: You can channel momentum from mighty swings to strike harder or swing again.

name: Keen Mind
description: Your accuracy of recall lets you remember everything you have seen or heard in the past month.

name: Lucky
description: You can spend luck to sway the outcome of attacks, checks, or saving throws.

name: Observant
description: Your sharp attention to detail improves passive perception and allows you to read subtle cues.

name: War Caster
description: You have honed battle magic, making it easier to cast spells in the thick of combat.
